id.napta_id.description: Napta identifier of the Project. Either `id.napta_id` or `id.external_id` must be provided (but not both).
id.napta_id.title: Id.Napta Id

id.external_id.description: Unique reference of the Project (see [External Ids](#tag/External-Ids)). Either `id.napta_id` or `id.external_id` must be provided (but not both).
id.external_id.title: Id.External Id
